data.title: All About Reese Quiz
data.meta_description: Reese Williams stint on AMC was short but also historical and memorable. See if you are a Reese expert with this quiz! Good luck! All air dates are American.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Which actress originated the role of Reese on "AMC"?

Answer: Tamara Braun

Braun, born on April 18th, 1971 in Evanston, Illinois, originated the role of Reese Williams on "AMC" in October of 2008. Prior to her run on "AMC", she appeared as Carly Corinthos on the ABC soap opera, "General Hospital", and as Ava Vitali on the NBC soap opera "Days of our Lives." She also appeared in an episode of "CSI: Crime Scene Investigation." In 2009, Braun won a Daytime Emmy for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series for her role of Ava Vitali on "Days of our Lives." Other Daytime Emmy nominees for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series, that year, were Melissa Claire Egan of "All My Children", Alicia Minshew of "All My Children", Julie Pinson of "As The World Turns", and Bree Williamson of "One Life to Live."

2. What was Reese's mother's name?

Answer: Claire

Reese barely spoke about her parents, to Bianca, since they could not accept that she was a lesbian. However, Erica called Reese's mother, Claire, and asked her to come to Bianca and Reese's wedding shower. That was where Claire introduced herself. Later on, at the party, she and Reese fought. Neither Claire nor Reese's father showed up at her wedding to Bianca.

3. The state where Bianca and Reese got married, in February of 2009, had legalized gay marriage in real life at that point.

Answer: True

Bianca and Reese got engaged and decided they wanted to get married. Since Pine Valley is set in Pennsylvania, the show wanted to make their nuptials more realistic and, at the time of taping, gay marriage in reality had not been legalized in Pennsylvania.

The show decided to have Bianca and Reese marry in Connecticut which, at the time of taping, had legalized gay marriage. Bianca and Reese were the first same sex couple to legally marry in daytime.

4. What was the name of Reese's ex-boyfriend who paid her a visit in Pine Valley?

Answer: Simon

Reese did not tell Bianca about how she had a boyfriend before they got together. Bianca blasted Reese for not informing her of this but she eventually forgave her. Reese explained, to Bianca, that her parents hooked her up with Simon, her boyfriend, and the relationship felt awkward to her.

She even said that, while with Simon, she did not know who she was. Simon eventually paid Reese a visit but she told him she did not have feelings for him since she was a lesbian.

5. At Bianca and Reese's wedding, who told Greenlee about seeing Zach and Reese having sex?

Answer: Ryan Lavery

Bianca and Reese wanted to do a double wedding with Ryan and Greenlee, who had just gotten engaged to get remarried. On the eve of their wedding, Ryan went to Greenlee and told her he saw Zach and Reese having sex (they actually kissed). He said that he did not want to get married with Bianca and Reese due to Reese's deceit and lies.

6. Who caused Reese to go blind, temporarily, in March of 2009?

Answer: Zach Slater

Zach and Reese got into an argument one day, at Chandler Mansion, and he started to drag her off. Reese pulled off of him and slipped into a table, at the house, and her eyes fell on glass. She was treated at the hospital but, when Angie took her bandages off, she said she could not see. Reese regained her eyesight within a couple of weeks.

7. What occupation did Reese have while in Pine Valley?

Answer: Architect

While Reese was in Pine Valley, with Bianca, she worked as an architect. This was mentioned several times, on the show, and she even was seen, in a couple scenes, at her job as an architect. When she left Pine Valley with Bianca to go to Paris, in April of 2009, she continued to be an architect there.

8. Who held Reese hostage, in January of 2009?

Answer: Josh Madden

Josh came back to Pine Valley after he had embezzled money from Zach's casino. There was a standoff, at the casino, and Josh took Reese hostage. Jesse attempted to mediate the situation but there was a shootout and Zach shot Josh dead. Josh's heart was transplanted into Kendall's body. Reese was not injured from the ordeal.

9. According to Bianca, she and Reese met in what kind of location in Paris?

Answer: Park

Bianca told everyone the story of how she and Reese got together and mentioned that they met each other in a park in Paris. They immediately became friends and started to date. When they arrived in Pine Valley, they were already in a serious relationship.

10. Who asked Reese's father to come to Pine Valley to talk with her?

Answer: Bianca Montgomery

Reese's father paid her a visit to discuss her being a lesbian. Reese became irate when her father found her, in Pine Valley, and she told him to leave. Reese learned that Bianca had asked her father to come visit her so she told Bianca to not do that to her again. Bianca informed Reese that she thought it would be right for them to make up but Reese told her she had no intentions of being on good terms with her parents ever again.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor Gamemaster1967 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
